titles.title: Big Horn Bentonite Act
A bill to provide for the sale of bentonite in Big Horn County, Wyoming".
A bill to open certain withdrawn land in Big Horn County, Wyoming, to locatable mineral development for bentonite mining.
Big Horn Bentonite Act
Big Horn Bentonite Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources Subcommittee on Public Lands and Forests. Hearings held. With printed Hearing: S.Hrg. 108-10.
Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Ordered to be reported with an amendment in the nature of a substitute favorably.

Committee on Energy and Natural Resources. Reported by Senator Domenici under authority of the order of the Senate of 07/22/04 with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title. With written report No. 108-319.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 675.

vote.text: Passed Senate with an amendment and an amendment to the Title by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water and Power.

bill.summary: Declares open to locatable mineral development for bentonite mining certain withdrawn lands in Big Horn County, Wyoming.Permits the Secretary of the Army to close such land upon determination that closure is required by reason of a national emergency or for the purpose of national defense or security.
